The comment related to the appYp2 promoter of Escherichia coli K-12 is 'Based on ChIP-microarray analysis, it was shown that StpA binds to the promoter region in appYp2 |CITS:[RDBECOLIPRC27241][RDBECOLIPRC10718]|. qRT-PCR revealed a strong 75-fold repression of appY by H-NS and more than 1,000-fold repression by H-NS/StpA |CITS:[RDBECOLIPRC18945]|. Transcription directed across H-NS binding regions relieves H-NS-mediated (and H-NS/StpA-mediated) repression of promoters such as proVp3, pdeLp3, and appYp2, and there is a correlation between transcription across the H-NS-bound region and derepression where RNA polymerase is able to remodel the H-NS complex and/or dislodge H-NS from the DNA and thus relieve repression |CITS:[RDBECOLIPRC18945]|. '
